resources.string: Fill in the fields to modify the data
" You have obtained the following points for completing the course:"
How many stars do you rate the route?
" Enter a comment for the evaluation of the path"
" Choose whether to modify the first or last name or the password, or all three fields"
To delete your profile enter your account password

Here you can log in to your account, if it has not been created just register by clicking on the subscribe button. You can log in without registering by pressing the key log in as guest. Be careful because some features are blocked
In this screen it is possible to search for the route in two ways: the first through the gps (accept the permission), the second is done manually by clicking on the magnifying glass.

Once the magnifying glass has been clicked, it is possible to search through the appropriate search bar: you can search for a route according to your needs, for example: attractions along the route, characteristics of the route. Once you have chosen the path to follow, just click on it
Here you can see all the characteristics of the route you have selected. To start the journey, press the start button. You can share the route with your friends by clicking on the share button
In this screen you can see the attractions of the route. Click on the arrows to navigate through them and, if available, you can start an activity which, if registered, allows you to collect points
